ASCII Endless

//shift M<<8
1 00 0 00 0001 0 01101
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
//add H
1 00 0 00 0001 0 01000
0 01 1 10 0000 0 00000

//write AR to ram (MH)
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 00001
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000

//shift R<<8
1 00 0 00 0001 0 10010
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 1 01 0000 0 00000
//add D
1 00 0 00 0001 0 00100
0 01 1 10 0000 0 00000

//write AR to ram (rd)
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 00001
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000

//write == to ram
1 01 1 11 0100 1 11101
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 00001
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000

//write K to ram
1 00 0 00 0001 0 01011
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 00001
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
//write e to ram
1 00 0 00 0001 1 00101
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 00001
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000

0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000

0 10 0 10 0000 0 00001
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000

0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000

0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000

0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000

//write == to ram
1 01 1 11 0100 1 11101
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000

//jmp top
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00000
0 00 0 00 0000 1 00000
